Title: Manufacturing Engineer
Company: Công Ty TNHH Laird Việt Nam
Salary:
$ 800-1,000 /tháng
Mức lương phổ biến trên thị trường là bao nhiêu?
Location: Lot K10, Que Vo Industrial Park (Extended), Nam Son Ward, Bac Ninh City, Bac Ninh Province, Vietnam, Hanoi, Vietnam, Bắc Giang, Việt Nam, Lô K10, Khu công nghiệp Quế Võ (khu vực mở rộng), Phường Nam Sơn, Thành phố Bắc Ninh, Tỉnh Bắc Ninh, Việt Nam
Job Description:
We are seeking a highly skilled Manufacturing Engineer to join our dynamic team at Laird Vietnam in Bac Ninh. In this role, you will be responsible for developing manufacturing processes and equipment for various products, including metal and thermal components, based on customer designs.

** For candidates who reside in Hanoi, the company provides a shuttle bus for commuting to work in Bac Ninh **

Primary Duties & Responsibilities
- Develop manufacturing processes and equipment for products (metal, thermal, MCP, and others) based on customer designs.
- Communicate with customers to consult about product requirements to ensure alignment with engineering capabilities.
- Work collaboratively with appropriate departments/teams to develop product designs and tooling, and to source the best materials for new projects or designs.
- Coordinate with other sites’ engineering and related cross-functional teams to enhance engineering capabilities such as manufacturing technology, product design, and product requirements.
- Estimate production lead times, staffing requirements, and related costs to provide information for management decisions.
- Create and modify manufacturing work instructions and process documents such as work instructions (WI), standard operating procedures (SOP), and engineering change notices (ECN).
- Conduct trials for products to verify product design, process design, and equipment functionality.
- Confirm production capabilities and implement improvements, troubleshooting solutions to ensure smooth mass production.
- Promote continuous improvement of the production process through tooling and fixture design to increase quality, productivity, efficiency, and cost savings.
- Train and supervise production staff on new processes and methodologies.
- Support sourcing the most efficient suppliers/vendors for purchasing materials or services.
- Develop, modify, and enhance processes to ensure efficient production methods.
- Interface with outside vendors to determine product specifications; coordinate the purchase of equipment, materials, and/or parts; and evaluate products to ensure they meet specifications and quality standards.
- Scope and evaluate production automation equipment.
- Lead and execute process improvements using tools such as Gage R&R, Cpk, and SPC.
- Understand and implement Lean Manufacturing principles, Value Stream Mapping, and 5S techniques.
- Comply with required regulatory agencies, including the FDA, CDA, and CFDA.

Company: Nexon Dev VINA
Salary:
Thương lượng
Mức lương phổ biến trên thị trường là bao nhiêu?
Location: UOA TOWER, Tân Trào, Tân Phú, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, Tầng 11, Tòa nhà UOA, 06 Tân Trào, Phường Tân Phú, Quận 7, TP. Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
Chúng tôi hướng tới việc tạo ra những thành phẩm 3D rigging đa dạng cho [Vindictus: Defying Fate] với chất lượng nghệ thuật đỉnh cao thông qua việc ứng dụng công nghệ Unreal Engine 5 mới nhất cùng thiết lập vật lý đẹp mắt và chân thực.

Vindictus: Defying Fate là một dự án 3D action RPG với bối cảnh fantasy thời trung đại. Hiện tại, project đang được sản xuất theo phong cách realistic và phát triển dựa trên IP Mabinogi Heroes. Đây là tựa game độc lập hoàn toàn với series Mabinogi, nhắm đến thị trường PC/console và được xây dựng trên nền tảng Unreal Engine 5. Vì hình ảnh của nhân vật đóng vai trò cực kỳ quan trọng trong game nên dự án đòi hỏi chất lượng cao nhất trong việc tạo dựng model, rigging và thiết lập vật lý.

Công việc chính:
- Thực hiện các công đoạn 3D rigging đa dạng của [Vindictus: Defying Fate]
- Thiết kế rig tối ưu hóa và cấu hình controller cho playable character, costume, monster...
- Thiết lập vật lý cho đa dạng các yếu tố như trang phục, lông,...
- Thiết lập điều khiển khuôn mặt (facial control) trên nền tảng Unreal Engine - MetaHuman
- Thiết lập rig cho các phân cảnh cinematic
- Thiết lập trang bị và props

20tr-25tr ₫/tháng

Job Description:
Bạn Sẽ Làm Gì Tại Calie?
1. Kiến tạo chiến lược tuyển dụng
- Đồng hành cùng công ty trong việc hoạch định chiến lược tuyển dụng, đáp ứng sát sao nhu cầu nhân sự trong từng giai đoạn phát triển.
- Chủ động tìm kiếm và kết nối với những tài năng xuất chúng, từ các vị trí chuyên môn đến lãnh đạo cấp cao.
- Quản lý toàn diện hành trình tuyển dụng: từ lên kế hoạch, truyền thông, sàng lọc hồ sơ, phỏng vấn cho đến đánh giá, đảm bảo ứng viên không chỉ giỏi – mà còn đúng người.
2. Tuyển đúng người phù hợp vào đúng lúc, đúng vị trí
- Thiết kế và triển khai quy trình phỏng vấn chuẩn khung năng lực, giúp đánh giá đúng năng lực thật của ứng viên.
- Là người gác đền giá trị văn hóa, bạn sẽ thực hiện phỏng vấn văn hóa để đảm bảo từng mảnh ghép mới đều hòa nhịp cùng giá trị cốt lõi của tổ chức.
- Lan tỏa tư duy tuyển dụng chất lượng bằng cách đào tạo và nâng cao năng lực phỏng vấn cho đội ngũ.
3. Xây dựng thương hiệu tuyển dụng
- Góp phần xây dựng hình ảnh một công ty mơ ước trong mắt ứng viên, thông qua các chiến lược thương hiệu tuyển dụng chuyên nghiệp và cảm xúc.
- Chủ động triển khai các chiến dịch truyền thông tuyển dụng sáng tạo trên LinkedIn, Facebook, Website… nhằm lan tỏa thông điệp hấp dẫn về công ty.
- Phối hợp cùng team Marketing để phát triển nội dung EB đầy cảm hứng
4. Không ngừng cải tiến – Để mỗi mùa tuyển dụng tốt hơn mùa trước
- Luôn đặt câu hỏi “Làm sao để tốt hơn?”, bạn sẽ là người đề xuất và hiện thực hóa các giải pháp tối ưu hóa quy trình tuyển dụng.
- Xây dựng hệ thống dữ liệu ứng viên bền vững, nuôi dưỡng mối quan hệ lâu dài với những ứng viên tiềm năng cho tương lai.
- Theo dõi, phân tích và đưa ra đề xuất cải tiến tuyển dụng dựa trên dữ liệu và hiệu quả thực tế.

***Công ty luôn open với các ứng viên phỏng vấn trước tết và nhận việc sau tết

Company: SNA - INTERNATIONAL SCHOOLS OF NORTH AMERICA
Salary:
$ 2,000-3,000 /tháng
Mức lương phổ biến trên thị trường là bao nhiêu?
Location: Street No. 20, Him Lam Residential Area, Binh Hung Ward, Binh Chanh District, HCMC, Street 20, Him Lam Residential Area, Binh Chanh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
The Head of Admissions & Marketing leads the school’s strategies for student recruitment, enrollment, and retention to achieve institutional growth targets. This role oversees admissions operations, marketing initiatives, and team performance to ensure efficiency, consistency, and alignment with the school’s strategic goals. The position works closely with the school leadership team to drive enrollment success, maintain brand integrity, and support the school’s long-term sustainability.

Responsibilities:
1. Leadership & Strategy
- Lead the full admissions and enrollment lifecycle to achieve annual growth targets.
- Drive strategic planning for student recruitment, retention, and overall market positioning.
- Provide leadership in developing goals and implementing strategic plans as assigned by the Managing Director.
- Ensure financial stability and sound budget management aligned with school priorities.
2. Admissions Operations
- Direct and manage admissions programs for recruitment, enrollment, and retention.
- Develop annual goals, action plans, and reporting systems for attracting and retaining students.
- Implement long-term enrollment and retention strategies to fill each cohort with qualified students.
- Oversee local and international admissions processes and ensure school leadership involvement.
- Maintain and optimize the CRM system for effective pipeline management.
- Review admissions standards, policies, and final admit/deny decisions with the Head of School.
- Provide accurate and timely enrollment forecasting for Board budgeting.
3. Team & Office Management
- Oversee daily operations of the Admissions & Marketing Office, including budgets, databases, and communications.
- Manage, guide, and evaluate Admissions and Marketing staff.
- Monitor team performance to ensure alignment with enrollment KPIs.
4. Community & Stakeholder Engagement
- Strengthen relationships with partner schools, community organizations, and professional consultants.
- Collaborate closely with Parent Ambassadors and the Parent Association.
- Work in close partnership with Heads of non-academic departments.
- Plan and execute admissions events and receptions for prospective families.
- Stay updated on industry trends, best practices, and relevant admissions developments.
5. Other Duties
- Undertake additional tasks as assigned by the Head of School.

Quản lý Một trong các hạng mục công việc sau:

• Kiểm soát hồ sơ pháp lý và hồ sơ đầu vào của Nhà thầu thi công

Title: Operation eCommerce Manager - Brand.com Focus
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sữa Việt Nam (Vinamilk)
Salary:
Thương lượng
Mức lương phổ biến trên thị trường là bao nhiêu?
Location: 10 Tan Trao Street, Tan My Ward, HCMC, Số 10, Tân Trào, P. Tân Phú, Q.7, Tp. HCM
Job Description:
Position Overview
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Operation eCommerce Manager to lead and focus optimize daily operations of our Brand.com platform. This role is responsible for ensuring seamless end-to-end execution across order management, logistics, merchandising, and customer experience while driving operational excellence and revenue growth. The ideal candidate has proven experience managing Brand.com eCommerce operations and is passionate about building best-in-class direct-to-consumer (D2C) experiences.

Key Responsibilities
Operational Management
Oversee daily operations for Brand.com, including order processing, payment flow, inventory alignment, fulfillment, and returns.
Ensure smooth coordination across internal teams (Marketing, Supply Chain, IT, Finance) and external partners (logistics providers, payment gateways).
Implement and monitor SLA/KPI frameworks for order accuracy, delivery times, customer satisfaction, and platform performance.
Process Optimization & Efficiency
Design, standardize, and continuously improve eCommerce processes for scalability and automation.
Collaborate with tech/product teams to enhance OMS, CRM, loyalty programs, and other system integrations.
Apply data-driven insights to reduce costs, increase conversion, and improve customer lifetime value.
Commercial & Merchandising Support
Support campaign launches, product availability, and price hygiene enforcement on Brand.com.
Ensure correct product content, promotions, and category structure align with marketing strategy.
Partner with demand planning and supply teams to optimize stock levels and forecast accuracy.
Customer Experience Excellence
Monitor end-to-end customer journey from browsing to post-purchase.
Resolve escalated customer issues and ensure policies for returns/refunds are executed fairly and efficiently.
Collaborate with UX, marketing, and service teams to deliver seamless experiences.
Reporting & Performance Management
Track and report on daily/weekly/monthly KPIs (traffic, conversion, AOV, fulfillment rates, NPS).
Conduct root-cause analysis of operational issues and drive corrective actions.
Prepare management updates and operational da shboards.

The Ecommerce Commercial & Marketing Operations Senior Associate will oversee the daily operations of our online sales channels, manage marketing activities, and ensure seamless integration between commercial strategies and marketing initiatives. This role is pivotal in driving online sales growth, optimizing marketing campaigns, and enhancing the overall customer experience.

Key Responsibilities:
Marketing Activities:
Work closely with the marketing team to develop and implement digital marketing campaigns, including SEO, PPC, email marketing, and social media.
Utilize data analytics to refine marketing strategies and optimize user experience.
Monitor and report on key performance metrics, providing actionable insights.
Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of marketing campaigns, providing insights and recommendations for improvement.
Coordinate with creative teams to ensure consistent branding and messaging across all online channels, to develop compelling content and visuals.
Commercial Strategy:
Analyze market trends, consumer behavior, and competitor activities to identify opportunities for business expansion
Develop and execute comprehensive e-commerce strategies to drive brand visibility and increase online sales.
Lead the planning and execution of promotional campaigns to enhance brand recognition and drive traffic.
Enhance the online customer experience by implementing best practices in UX/UI design and program streamline.

Thương lượng

Job Description:
The Inventory Accountant is responsible for managing and maintaining
accurate inventory records, performing reconciliations, and ensuring
compliance with accounting standards and company policies. This role plays
a critical part in the financial accuracy of inventory valuation and supports
operational efficiency across the organization.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Inventory Management & Reconciliation:
• Maintain accurate and timely inventory records in the accounting
system
• Perform monthly inventory reconciliations between physical counts and
system records
• Investigate and resolve inventory discrepancies, variances, and
adjustments
2. Financial Reporting & Analysis:
• Prepare monthly inventory reports and variance analysis
• Support month-end and year-end close processes related to inventory
• Ensure compliance with GAAP and company accounting policies
• Assist with internal and external audits related to inventory
3. Process Improvement & Compliance:
• Develop and implement inventory control procedures and best
practices
• Collaborate with warehouse and operations teams to improve
inventory accuracy
• Identify opportunities for process automation and efficiency
improvements
4. Cross-Functional Collaboration:
• Work closely with Procurement, Warehousing, and Operations teams
from US
• Provide inventory data and analysis to management as needed
• Support other accounting and finance projects as assigned
